TopicTitle: UNSC ONI Black Cat Sub Prowler Prototype

Articles.Content:
NEW MISSILE.

The new concealed archer pod and enhanced sensor suite equipped prowler has been released. Fuel flow still needs to be fixed but is improved.

This missile is seriously effective when used like a concealed mine against enemy combat ships. A test against the prowler with guidance systems active:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download the prototype 3: https://www.dropbox.com/s/8l8vrypn3uuwtn6/ONI%20Black%20Cat%20Prowler%20Prototype%203.craft

I made an ONI Black Cat sub prowler. It is about 360 parts, sheathed in stealth coating, and not made for combat. It is around 60 tons and is only a prototype right now due to a fuel flow glitch that is very complex.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/39gtt90qsc4p8yp/ONI%20Black%20Cat%20Prowler%20Prototype.craft

Javascript is disabled. View full album

New decoy edition to be released soon:

Edited February 6, 2014 by andrew123

Not bad. Not bad at all...

EDIT: umm, how do you take this thing off?

Edited December 25, 2013 by longbyte1

It's currently a prototype that will soon be armed with stealthy disguised Shiva Class missile pod missiles, so currently more of a proof of concept due to a serious and untraceable fuel glitch that must be fixed. It takes off by hacking gravity then maneuvering away quickly, or just using hyperedit to get into orbit.

Edited December 25, 2013 by andrew123
